actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO tb_orcamentos (
  id_orcamento,
  id_solicitacao,
  paciente,
  status,
  valor_total,
  subtotal,
  desconto,
  desconto_percent,
  valor_hosp,
  valor_opme,
  valor_saitg,
  valor_robotica,
  valor_diarias,
  valor_procedimento,
  clinica,
  medico,
  utia,
  utip,
  utin,
  apto,
  dayclinic,
  especialidade,
  dt_solicitacao,
  dt_envio,
  dt_previsto,
  dt_criacao,
  dt_atualizacao,
  pacote,
  dt_internacao,
  dt_alta
) VALUES (
  {{idOrcamentoInput.text}},
  {{idSolicitacaoInput.text}},
  {{pacienteInput.text}},
  {{statusSelect.selectedOptionValue}},
  {{valorTotalInput.text}},
  {{subtotalInput.text}},
  {{descontoInput.text}},
  {{descontoPercentInput.text}},
  {{valorHospInput.text}},
  {{valorOpmeInput.text}},
  {{valorSaitgInput.text}},
  {{valorRoboticaInput.text}},
  {{valorDiariasInput.text}},
  {{valorProcedimentoInput.text}},
  {{clinicaInput.text}},
  {{medicoInput.text}},
  {{utiaInput.text}},
  {{utipInput.text}},
  {{utinInput.text}},
  {{aptoInput.text}},
  {{dayclinicInput.text}},
  {{especialidadeInput.text}},
  {{dtSolicitacaoPicker.selectedDate}},
  {{dtEnvioPicker.selectedDate}},
  {{dtPrevistoPicker.selectedDate}},
  NOW(),
  NOW(),
  {{pacoteInput.text}},
  {{dtInternacaoPicker.selectedDate}},
  {{dtAltaPicker.selectedDate}}
);
